name: Endless Runner (Arash)
description:
Title: Endless Runner

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You should run and jump to take the scores as much as you can.

Instructions: it is an endless game so you should keep going as much as you can and try to take the score as higher as you can.

Game Designer: Arash Hassanzadeh Tavakkol
